string.s: We're getting closer to that new Champion, I can feel it...
Where did that guy came from, anyway? I thought the only new Champion was the Queen.
I have no idea, but recently, I've heard rumors of new Champions popping up left and right...
The Queen must be up to something, because it's been a long time since knights had been given Champions titles.
And now this new guy is trying to stop us, huh?
Lets go teach him a lesson!
Sir, we've finished setting up the traps!
Just in time! Soldier, in formation! Let's stop this deserter!+
Apparently, the Queen has been doing some propaganda against you...
It'll be harder to find help now.
Yeah, she has this all planned out...
Let's keep going.
Well, look who we have here!
A good old traitor for us to kill!
What?! Peterson?!
I can't believe you turned against me too!
Oh ho, your Majesty, that was long overdue, don't you think?
After all you've done, I'm finally getting some payback!
Look, now I have my own troops!
I did what I had to do as king! Stop with this act!
Oh ho ho, you can try to convince me...
In hell!
Ohhh ho... Looks like you've got me good...
You've left me no choice.
Very well then, I'll be seeing you in hell, False King!
Old King, welcome to my arena!
Are you ready to +die?
The only one who's going to die today is you!
You're a disgrace to all Champions! Betraying your own King--
A disgrace, you say? All Champions?
This False King by your side is the real disgrace to all Champions!
I'm Freedom, I'm the light of this kingdom, the first success of the Queen's Army!+
You two are no more than a stepping stone on my way to becoming the Greatest Champion that ever lived!
Shut your stupid mouth, you're nothing but another toy at the hands of the Queen!
You're freedom? Well, I'm here to lock you up!
+The Pawn joined your party!
Hmpf.
Fine then, come face me,##+ Bastille, ##+Rook Champion!+
Thanks for playing Chess Champions!
